# hyperping_monitor_report (Data Source)

Fetches the SLA and outage report for a specific Hyperping monitor.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The UUID of the monitor to get the report for.

### Optional

- `from` (String) Start date for the report period in ISO 8601 format. Optional.
- `to` (String) End date for the report period in ISO 8601 format. Optional.

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) The name of the monitor.
- `outages` (Attributes) Outage statistics for the report period. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--outages))
- `protocol` (String) The protocol of the monitor.
- `sla` (Number) The SLA percentage for the report period (e.g., 99.95).

<a id="nestedatt--outages"></a>
### Nested Schema for `outages`

Read-Only:

- `count` (Number) Total number of outages.
- `longest_outage` (Number) Longest single outage in seconds.
- `longest_outage_formatted` (String) Human-readable longest outage.
- `total_downtime` (Number) Total downtime in seconds.
- `total_downtime_formatted` (String) Human-readable total downtime (e.g., '1hr 10min 31s').
